content:
Diagnosis:
Metastatic sigmoid colon cancer (serrated adenocarcinoma)
Duke's C2, MSI-low, BRAF non-V600E mutant

Previous treatment:
Anterior resection March 2023
Adjuvant CAPOX completed September 2023
Pulmonary metastases identified December 2023
FOLFIRI/Bevacizumab commenced January 2024

Current situation:
Cycle 4 FOLFIRI/Bevacizumab review

Disease status:
CT chest 15 April 2024 shows progression of pulmonary metastases
New 2cm right lower lobe nodule
Existing nodules increased by >30%
CEA risen from 45 to 89

Current symptoms:
Increasing breathlessness on exertion
New dry cough
Weight loss 3kg over 6 weeks
Performance status deteriorated to ECOG 2

Previous medical history:
Type 2 diabetes
Hypertension

Current medications:
FOLFIRI/Bevacizumab regime
Metformin 1g BD
Ramipril 5mg OD

Plan:
Discontinue FOLFIRI/Bevacizumab due to disease progression
Commence Trifluridine/Tipiracil (Lonsurf) as third-line therapy
Dose calculated at 35mg/m2 BD days 1-5 and 8-12 of 28-day cycle
Review in 2 weeks with blood tests
Repeat CT after cycle 2
Referral made to palliative care team for symptom management
